link-text: The rantings of a guy in Internet Operations: The 500 mile email.
link-description:
pegmanm:

Speaking with a colleague re appropriate ping times over distance this evening reminded me of this. So I thought I root around and share.

The following is the 500-mile email story in the form it originally appeared, in a post to sage-members on Sun, 24 Nov 2002.:

From trey@sage.org Fri Nov 29...

I thought I’d take a moment to remember just how awesome SMTP is, and then I came across this awesome story of system administratoring.
